DOC.brief_summary: The goal Minnesota center integrate primary care , home , community-based intervention strategy promote sustain pattern change food intake , physical activity , body weight among low income , ethnically diverse child . A culturally match family connector create linkage among setting support parent make home environment parent behavior change conducive healthy growth development child . Specific Aim 1 To evaluate effect three-year multi-setting parent-targeted randomize control intervention primary outcome , child BMI , compare standard primary care-only intervention among 500 low income ethnic minority two four year old child 50th percentile BMI age gender . Hypothesis 1 : Children multi-setting parent-targeted intervention lower BMI 24 36 month , compare child standard primary care control group . Specific Aim 2 To evaluate effect three-year multi-setting parent-targeted intervention secondary outcome , include change child energy intake physical activity energy expenditure , compare standard primary care-only intervention . Hypothesis 2 : Children multi-setting parent-targeted intervention lower energy intake high energy expenditure three-year period , compare child standard primary care-only control group . Specific Aim 3 To evaluate effect multi-setting parent-targeted intervention hypothesize mediator change dietary intake , physical activity , BMI . Hypothesis 3 : It hypothesize change parent behavior home food physical activity environment mediate change child energy intake expenditure , body mass index .
DOC.criteria: A child parent ( ) eligible study : two four year old child schedule receive eligible ( base upcoming birthday ) recommend well child visit conduct pediatric family practice care provider ; child medical problem would preclude study participation determine physician conduct well child visit ( e.g . serious disease would make follow guideline parent encouragement healthy diet physical activity infeasible ) ; child 's BMI great equal 50th percentile accord CDC age sex reference standard http : //www.cdc.gov/nchs/data/nhanes/growthcharts/bmiage.txt ; child 's parent/guardian agree participation study plan move state next three year primary caregiver willing able complete evaluation measure participate intervention activity assign active intervention group . parent speak either English Spanish .
